parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Employ {{ ac-4.20_prm_1 }} to control the flow of {{ ac-4.20_prm_2 }} across security domains.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Organizations define approved solutions and configurations in cross-domain policies and guidance in accordance with the types of information flows across classification boundaries. The National Security Agency (NSA) National Cross Domain Strategy and Management Office provides a listing of approved cross-domain solutions. Contact ncdsmo@nsa.gov for more information.
